item.description:
We are having our first ski meetup at Pat's Peak on Saturday 1/23. The mountain is located about 1.5 hrs north of Boston. Plan to leave around 1pm from the Boston area for night skiing from 3pm to 10pm.
The price is $39 which includes rentals, tubing, and lesson tips. Please see below for more info:

http://www.patspeak.c...

This is a great chance to get active in the winter, make some ski buddies, and enjoy a wonderful day of skiing or riding.

We will meet in the beginners area at 3:15pm for a quick meet and greet and then hit the slopes. Later, we will meet for dinner in the lodge.

Please check out this first time guide if this will be your first time out on the slopes. All levels are welcome. And please indicate your level of skier/snowboarder that you are in your RSVP.

http://www.patspeak.c...


Carpools suggested - transportation is your own responsibility. Due to the long drive, we recommend that people carpool. If you need a ride or can provide a ride, please note that in your RSVP and we will try to arrange carpools as best as we can. Suggested carpool fee $8 to pay for gas and tolls paid directly to the driver.

Looking forward to hitting the slopes with you!

group.name: The Greater Boston Asian Professionals Meetup Group

item.name: Skiing at Pat's Peak
